Parameters: ECParameterSpec: the associated elliptic curve domain parameters.
Throws: if w or params is null.
if w is point at infinity, i.e. ECPoint.POINT_INFINITY
ECPublicKeySpec(java.security.spec.ECPoi.Description: Creates a new ECPublicKeySpec with the specified parameter values.

getParams().Description: Returns the associated elliptic curve domain parameters.

ClassDesc: This immutable class specifies an elliptic curve public key with its associated parameters.
